channel.title: Live on Rowan Amateur Radio Society
channel.description: Recent content in Live on Rowan Amateur Radio Society

item.title: Live Repeater Feed
item.description:
Listen Live

You can listen to the N4UH repeater live through Broadcastify. This feed covers the RARS repeater system in Rowan County, NC.

Listen on Broadcastify

About the Feed

This Broadcastify feed streams audio from the N4UH 2-meter repeater operated by the Rowan Amateur Radio Society:

  • 2m Repeater: 145.410 MHz, -0.600 offset, 136.5 PL

Note: Only the 2m repeater is streamed on Broadcastify. The 70cm repeater (443.250 MHz) is not included in this feed.
